body:
Patch petsc test cases so they can be built with the IBM XL compiler after spack install.  These test cases are built in a seperate step, outside of spack, but they need to patched after staging so users don't have to do it in a seperate step.
The test cases are installed under <petsc install directory>/share/petsc/examples and can be built and executed by invoking gmake -f gmakefile.test in that directory.
title: Patch PETSc test cases for IBM XL compiler
